metadata.author: Arte Flux, based on works of Eugr

single_gcode.label: GCode for single extrusion
single_gcode.description: Start GCode to run when doing single extrusion
single_gcode.default_value:
; **** Flashforge Creator 3 PRINTER start.gcode for using left or right extruder ****
M118 X28.65 Y20.00 Z10.10 T{initial_extruder_nr}
M140 S{material_bed_temperature} T0 ; set bed temperature
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0, initial_extruder_nr} T{initial_extruder_nr} ; set left or right extruder temperature
M107
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
G1 F200 E10 ; extrude 10mm of feed stock 
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
G90
G1 Z0.500 F840 ; move Z to 0
M7 T0
M6 T{initial_extruder_nr} ; wait for temp
M651 ; chassis fan on
M106 S{cool_fan_speed} T{initial_extruder_nr} ; set cooling fan speed 
; **** end of start.gcode ****

dual_gcode.label: GCode for dual extrusion
dual_gcode.description: Start GCode to run when doing dual extrusion
dual_gcode.default_value:
; **** Flashforge Creator 3 PRINTER start.gcode for dual extrusion only ****
M118 X41.50 Y30.00 Z11.20 T0 T1
M140 S{material_bed_temperature} T0 ; set bed temperature
M104 S{material_print_temperature, 0} T0 ; set right extruder temp
M104 S{material_print_temperature, 1} T1 ; set left extruder temp
M107 ; fan off
G90 ; absolute positioning
G1 Z0.500 F840
M7 T0 ; wait for platform
M6 T0 ; wait for temp
M6 T1 ; wait for temp
M108 T0 ; tool change
T0
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
G1 F200 E10 ; feed 10mm of feed stock 
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
M108 T1 ; tool change
T1
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
G1 F200 E10 ; feed 10mm of feed stock 
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance
M651 ; chassis fan on
M106 S{cool_fan_speed} T{initial_extruder_nr} ; set cooling fan speed
; **** end of start.gcode ****

single_endcode.label: End GCode for single extrusion
single_endcode.description: Start GCode to run when doing single extrusion
single_endcode.default_value:
; **** Flashforge Creator 3 single end.gcode ****
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
G1 F1600 Y-125.0 Z200.0 E-10 ; z-home and retract 10mm of feed stock 
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
M104 S0 T1  ; cool down left extruder
M104 S0 T0  ; cool down right extruder
M140 S0 T0 ; cool down bed
G162 Z F1800 ; home Z
M652 ; chassis fan OFF
G91 ; relative positioning
M18 ; disable steppers
; **** end of end.gcode ****

dual_endcode.label: End GCode for dual extrusion
dual_endcode.description: Start GCode to run when doing dual extrusion
dual_endcode.default_value:
; **** Flashforge Creator 3 dual end.gcode ****
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
G1 F1600 Y-125.0 Z200.0 E-10 ; z-home and retract 10mm of feed stock 
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
M104 S0 T1  ; cool down left extruder
M104 S0 T0  ; cool down right extruder
M140 S0 T0 ; cool down bed
G162 Z F1800 ; home Z
M652 ; chassis fan OFF
G91 ; relative positioning
M18 ; disable steppers
; **** end of dual end.gcode ****

prime_tower_position_x.value: machine_width/2 - max(extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'brim_width') * extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'initial_layer_line_width_factor') / 100 if adhesion_type == 'brim' or (prime_tower_brim_enable and adhesion_type != 'raft') else (extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'raft_margin') if adhesion_type == 'raft' else (extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'skirt_gap') if adhesion_type == 'skirt' else 0)), max(extruderValues('travel_avoid_distance'))) - max(extruderValues('support_offset')) - sum(extruderValues('skirt_brim_line_width')) * extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'initial_layer_line_width_factor') / 100 - (resolveOrValue('draft_shield_dist') if resolveOrValue('draft_shield_enabled') else 0) - 1

prime_tower_position_y.value: machine_depth/2 - prime_tower_size - max(extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'brim_width') * extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'initial_layer_line_width_factor') / 100 if adhesion_type == 'brim' or (prime_tower_brim_enable and adhesion_type != 'raft') else (extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'raft_margin') if adhesion_type == 'raft' else (extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'skirt_gap') if adhesion_type == 'skirt' else 0)), max(extruderValues('travel_avoid_distance'))) - max(extruderValues('support_offset')) - sum(extruderValues('skirt_brim_line_width')) * extruderValue(adhesion_extruder_nr, 'initial_layer_line_width_factor') / 100 - (resolveOrValue('draft_shield_dist') if resolveOrValue('draft_shield_enabled') else 0) - 1
